titleInfo.title: '3/14 Confidential Reports on Officers and Ministerial Staff, Bahrain'

physicalDescription.extent: This file is arranged approximately in chronological order. Circled index numbers in blue and red crayon can also be found throughout the volume.

Foliation: The foliation sequence commences at the front cover and terminates at the back cover; these numbers are written in pencil, and can be found in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Foliation errors: 1 and 1A. Foliation omissions: 16-20

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence between the British Political Agency at Bahrain and the British Political Residency in the Persian Gulf at Bushire. The correspondence concerns the institution of system of Annual Confidential Reports on their clerical staff in 1935 (ff. 1A-2), various changes to this policy (ff. 21, 30, 38), and the suggestion of instituting regular medical examinations (ff. 4-5). Most of these letters are reminders for the submission of the reports (ff. 3, 6, 7, 24-25, 26, 27, 35, 37, 39 and 41). The reports themselves are not included, however some lists of names of clerical staff are present in the file (ff. 13 and 25).
